text: Observed symptom: timeout on request. Users reported failures in the customer-service during normal operations
Logs show patterns of timeouts on related endpoints. Example log snippet: "E055: timeout on request at handler"
Root cause: circumstantial network partition Fixes applied: rolled back faulty deploy

This incident spans multiple services (customer-service, order-service, product-service). Symptom: inconsistent order state across services, failed compensating transactions, and user-visible errors
